attributes.action: Fairness for England & Justice for England's tax-payers & citizens.
attributes.additional_details: Research has revealed England is the highest taxed country in the U.K.Since the 1890's & the 1970's citizens in Scotland enjoying Free Benefits: Free Care for the Elderly-forced to sell their homes in England,Free University Tuition-England's students pay up to £9,000 annually,Free Anti-Cancer drugs & treatments worth thousands- too expensive in England, Education Maintenance Allowance worth £1,560 scrapped in the main in England, Free Prescriptions worth £7.40 each,Free parking at NHS hospitals, no toll-charging of road crossings anywhere in Scotland yet M25 Dartford Crossing tolls are still charging motorists & causing pollution,Free milk & school meals.Water meters are compulsory for home moves only in England.Cuts to services such as  libraries affect mainly England only.An England citizen is worth up to 25-35% less than a Scottish, Welsh or Irish citizen. We are demanding fairness & justice for England's citizens & tax-payers-after all we are all supposed to be a United KIngdom.
